# Install R packages
```{r}
# install.packages("tidyverse")
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Read the dataset from csv
```{r}
fish.data.raw <- read.csv("TrawlCatch_SpringPreyfishBottomTrawl (1).csv")
# fish.data.raw
```

# Change the format of date column to YYYY-MM-DD
```{r}
library(dplyr)
fish.data.raw %>%
  group_by(opDate) %>%
  mutate(opDate = paste0(substr(opDate,1,4), "-", substr(opDate,5,6), "-", substr(opDate,7,8))) %>%
  ungroup()

```

# Export to csv
```{r}
write.csv(fish.data.raw, "cleaned_fish_dataset.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
